trans-unit.source: Provides basic design-time functionality for ASP.NET server controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade básica em tempo de design para controles de servidor ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DHTML behavior that is associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comportamento DHTML associado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> that is associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> que está associado com o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Behavior%2A> property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Behavior%2A> está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property to map properties to styles.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> métodos no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propriedade para mapear propriedades de estilos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class to set styles for the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> método sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para definir estilos para o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data bindings collection for the current control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de associações de dados para o controle atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection" /> that contains the data bindings for the current control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection" /> que contém as associações de dados para o controle atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time object representing the control that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> object on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto em tempo de design que representa o controle associado ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The design-time object representing the control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de tempo de design que representa o controle associado a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DesignTimeElement%2A> property is used by the designer to retrieve the design-time object representing the control that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner> object on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DesignTimeElement%2A> pelo designer, a propriedade é usada para recuperar o objeto de tempo de design que representa o controle que está associado com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner> objeto na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> e libera opcionalmente os recursos gerados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets the expression bindings for the current control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as associações de expressão para o controle atual em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection" /> that contains the expressions strings set for properties in the current control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection" /> que contém as expressões de cadeias de caracteres definidas para propriedades no controle atual.

trans-unit.source: The design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> class to get the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor> class to get the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet> to set expressions for control properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: O design de host, tais como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], usa o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> classe para obter o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor> classe para obter o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet> para definir as expressões de propriedades de controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type.
trans-unit.target: Cadeias de caracteres de expressão fazem referência a um recurso localizável, uma configuração de aplicativo, uma cadeia de caracteres de conexão ou um tipo de expressão personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Expressions%2A> collection contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBinding> element for each control property that has an associated expression string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Expressions%2A> coleção contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBinding> elemento para cada propriedade de controle que tem uma cadeia de caracteres de expressão associada.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBinding.ExpressionPrefix%2A> property for each element indicates the associated expression builder implementation.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBinding.ExpressionPrefix%2A> propriedade para cada elemento indica a implementação do construtor de expressão associada.

trans-unit.source: The expression string is parsed and evaluated by its associated <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> to determine the control property value at run time.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de expressão é analisada e avaliada pelo seu associado <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> para determinar o valor da propriedade de controle em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The control element for design.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de controle para design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer and sets the component for design.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer e define o componente para design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method should be called by the designer host to initialize the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método deve ser chamado pelo host de designer para inicializar o designer.

trans-unit.source: During initialization, use the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute(System.String,System.String)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute(System.String)" /> methods on the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag" /> property to map properties to styles.
trans-unit.target: Durante a inicialização, use o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute(System.String,System.String)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute(System.String)" /> métodos no <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag" /> propriedade para mapear propriedades de estilos.

trans-unit.source: Called when a behavior is associated with the element.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um comportamento está associado ao elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property to map properties to styles.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> métodos no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propriedade para mapear propriedades de estilos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class to set styles for the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> método sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para definir estilos para o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method to manipulate the initial styles for the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método para manipular os estilos inicias para o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached" /> method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached" /> método pode ser substituído e implementado para executar processamento adicional quando um comportamento está anexado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: Called when a behavior disassociates from the element.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um comportamento é desassociado do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property to map properties to styles.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> métodos no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propriedade para mapear propriedades de estilos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class to set styles for the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> método sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para definir estilos para o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method for the control designer to perform actions before the designer object is released.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Dispose%2A> método para o designer de controle executar ações antes de liberar o objeto de designer.

trans-unit.source: The M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is detached from the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching pode ser substituído e implementado para executar processamento adicional quando um comportamento está desanexado do designer.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade que foi modificada.

trans-unit.source: Provides a method that can be used to indicate when a data binding has changed.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um método que pode ser usado para indicar quando uma associação de dados mudou.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> method should be called by a control designer after the control designer has made a change to the data bindings for the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> método deve ser chamado por um designer de controle depois que o designer de controle fez uma alteração para as associações de dados para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Changed> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> collection for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Changed> evento no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> coleção para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged(System.String)" /> method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the data bindings collection for the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged(System.String)" /> método pode ser substituído e implementado para executar processamento adicional quando a coleção de associações de dados para o controle é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Provides a way to perform additional processing when the associated control is attached to a parent control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma maneira de realizar processamento adicional quando o controle associado é anexado a um controle pai.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnSetParent" /> method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the designer is attached to a parent control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnSetParent" /> método pode ser substituído e implementado para executar processamento adicional quando o designer é anexado a um controle pai.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the names of the events of the component to expose.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém os nomes dos eventos do componente a expor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of events that are exposed at design-time for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> object for the component.
trans-unit.target: Define a lista de eventos que são expostos em tempo de design para o objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> para o componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterEvents%2A> method provides a way to add items to or remove items from the dictionary of events that a designer exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterEvents%2A> método fornece uma maneira de adicionar ou remover itens de um dicionário de eventos que expõe um designer por meio de um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events.
trans-unit.target: As chaves no dicionário de eventos são os nomes dos eventos.

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos são do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through <paramref name="events" /> or you can leave the dictionary unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar diretamente o dicionário que pode ser acessado por meio de <paramref name="events" /> ou você pode deixar o dicionário inalterado.

trans-unit.source: If you are overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterEvents(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.
trans-unit.target: Se você está substituindo o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterEvents(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método, chame a implementação base antes de executar seu próprio processo de filtragem.

trans-unit.source: The set of properties to filter for the component.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de propriedades a filtrar para o componente.

trans-unit.source: Allows the designer to expose a specific set of properties through a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o designer exponha um conjunto específico de propriedades por meio de um objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method provides a way to add items to or remove items from the dictionary of properties that a designer exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método fornece uma maneira de adicionar ou remover itens de um dicionário de propriedades que expõe um designer por meio de um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties.
trans-unit.target: As chaves no dicionário de propriedades são os nomes das propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos são do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through <paramref name="properties" /> or you can leave the dictionary unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar diretamente o dicionário que pode ser acessado por meio de <paramref name="properties" /> ou você pode deixar o dicionário inalterado.

trans-unit.source: If you are overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.
trans-unit.target: Se você está substituindo o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método, chame a implementação base antes de executar seu próprio processo de filtragem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a field declaration for the control in the code-behind file for the current design document during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é necessário criar uma declaração de campo para o controle no arquivo code-behind para o documento de design atual durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if a declaration should be created; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se uma declaração deve ser criada; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
